headline: Review & Preview: We’re Back!
summary: Outages related to Amazon Web Services hit a number of major websites and services, including Barron’s, but we were back in action as the afternoon rolled on.  The stock market didn’t lose a beat.  The Nasdaq Composite rallied 1.4%.

headline: Nvidia Peer Targets Buy Point — And Pulls Off This Unique Feat
summary: Riding the AI wave alongside Nvidia, Broadcom stock takes aim at a breakout as top funds keep scooping up shares.

headline: Advertising Software Stocks Q2 Results: Benchmarking AppLovin (NASDAQ:APP)
summary: Earnings results often indicate what direction a company will take in the months ahead. With Q2 behind us, let’s have a look at AppLovin (NASDAQ:APP) and its peers.
